== Pandhari (564828) ==

Pandhari is a village in the [[Dapoli]] taluka of [[Ratnagiri]] district with an area of 56.7 hectares and harbouring 1128 households with total population of 5780 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Dapoli Camp]] is at a distance of 18 km. Male population is 2752 and female population is 3028. Scheduled Caste Population is 6 and Scheduled Tribes population is 5369. Census Location Code of the village is 564828<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
